snippet: In his first visit to East Asia as head of the Catholic Church, Pope Francis met with South Koreans who lost relatives in a ferry disaster in April.
abstract: Pope Francis, in his first visit to East Asia as head of the Catholic Church, offers consolation to South Koreans who lost relatives in ferry disaster in April and expresses hope for reconciliation on divided Korean Peninsula.

byline.contributor: Edward Wong contributed reporting from Beijing. Patrick Zuo contributed research from Beijing.

lead_paragraph: In his first visit to East Asia as head of the Catholic Church, Pope Francis met with South Koreans who lost relatives in a ferry disaster in April.

headline.seo: Pope Francis Welcomed in South Korea
headline.main: Pontiff Voices Hope for Korean Peace and Grief for Ferry Victims
headline.print_headline: Pontiff Voices Hope for Korean Peace and Grief for Ferry Victims

keywords.value: Far East, South and Southeast Asia and Pacific Areas
